channel.description: Recent content in embedded Tutorial on

item.title: Getting started with embedded
item.description: Embedded systems development architecture # Basic architecture examples on how development for embedded systems works (i.e. IDEs, cross-compiling, downloading, in-line debugging, JTAG,…) and what would be the minimum requirements for starting. It would be worth mentioning different approaches and platforms from begginers-higher level to advanced-lower level, like from Arduino, Raspberry, Launchpad to direct development using C on MSP, ATxx, ARMxx, etc… Not necessarily detailed but from a global point of view.
